title: Nvidia's Recent Financial Performance and Market Developments
body:
In the past week, Nvidia reported its financial results for the third quarter of fiscal year 2026, ending October 26, 2025. The company achieved record revenue of $57.0 billion, marking a 22% increase from the previous quarter and a 62% rise year-over-year. Data Center revenue reached $51.2 billion, up 25% sequentially and 66% from the same period last year. ([investor.nvidia.com](https://investor.nvidia.com/news/press-release-details/2025/NVIDIA-Announces-Financial-Results-for-Third-Quarter-Fiscal-2026/default.aspx?utm_source=openai))

Despite these strong financial results, Nvidia's stock experienced a modest decline of approximately 2.5% to 4% in after-hours trading following the announcement. This reaction was attributed to concerns over the sustainability of rapid AI-driven growth and the impact of U.S. export controls, which have restricted sales of certain products to China. ([markets.financialcontent.com](https://markets.financialcontent.com/stocks/article/marketminute-2025-8-28-nvidias-ai-reign-continues-strong-earnings-muted-reaction-and-the-future-of-the-tech-sector?utm_source=openai))

Additionally, Nvidia announced a strategic partnership with OpenAI to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of Nvidia systems for OpenAI’s next-generation AI infrastructure. The company also partnered with industry leaders, including Google Cloud, Microsoft, Oracle, and xAI, to build America’s AI infrastructure with hundreds of thousands of Nvidia GPUs. ([investor.nvidia.com](https://investor.nvidia.com/news/press-release-details/2025/NVIDIA-Announces-Financial-Results-for-Third-Quarter-Fiscal-2026/default.aspx?utm_source=openai))

key_dates.title: Q3 FY26 Financial Results Announcement
key_dates.importance_for_price: The announcement of record revenue and data center growth positively influenced investor sentiment, though concerns over export controls and market sustainability led to a modest stock decline.

key_dates.title: Partnership with OpenAI Announced
key_dates.importance_for_price: The strategic partnership with OpenAI to deploy Nvidia systems for AI infrastructure is expected to drive future revenue growth and strengthen Nvidia's position in the AI market.
